message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this incredible item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $8500 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to counter with an offer of $8750 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8900.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to counter with an offer of $8800 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm getting close, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8950.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $8850 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm getting close, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8975.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $8900 for the product.
